original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Parliament was adjourned for five minutes when Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa was addressing the session a short while ago.
The Opposition Leader was speaking about the recent Supreme Court ruling on Sri Lanka's bankruptcy, demanding for the government's position on the punishment for those proven guilty.
Catching Tax Absconders: Ajith Priyanka on THE TALK OF THE TOWN
